description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget screen for assigned deliveries in a delivery app. It includes a main stateless widget 'DeliveryAssignedDeliveriesScreen' with UI components such as app bar, header, and placeholder list items, as well as internal widget classes '_Header' and '_Row' for layout and styling.

classes.name: DeliveryAssignedDeliveriesScreen
classes.description: Main widget representing the assigned deliveries screen with header and placeholders.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: Widget rendering the header banner with gradient, icon, and title.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: Reusable widget for displaying list items with icon and text.

methods.name: _Header.build
methods.description: Builds the header layout with gradient, icon, and title.

methods.name: _Row.build
methods.description: Builds a row with icon and descriptive text.
